_comment: Inferred tags are applied after scraping and normalization. These tags are NOT from source data — they are curated based on exercise content analysis. This file survives re-scraping. See CLAUDE.md 'Inferred tags' for methodology.

heightening.description: Exercises that practice sequential amplification of a pattern — making it progressively more intense or absurd while staying on the same track. UCB: 'If this is true, what else is true?' Will Hines: 'Do it again, but more.'

grounding.description: Exercises that practice making scenes feel real, justified, and emotionally true — establishing base reality, justifying choices, and building character depth. The 'explore' complement to heightening.

game of the scene.description: Exercises that practice finding and playing the emergent comedic pattern in a scene — the UCB concept of identifying the 'first unusual thing' and heightening it. Distinct from short-form 'games' where rules are given externally.
